ygData.subject: Gazamel
ygData.msgSnippet: I know Gazamel to be a kind individual and have never heard anything bad said from her or about her. Mauldoon, on the other hand, has lied many times in the
ygData.messageBody:
I know Gazamel to be a kind individual and have never heard anything bad said from her or about her. Mauldoon, on the other hand, has lied many times in the past about many things. I do not give him one single bit of credit because I know all too well many of the lies he has told, proven to be lies by investigation or impossibilities. I don't understand the mind of such a person who will seem to say anything at all to get what he wants, make people like him, or make people think he always has the upper hand. I have a few stories of such incidences but I don't think I need to tell them. Sorry this has nothing to do with tinkering but I'm just sorta pissed that anyone even listens to Mauldoon. If you knew him under his lies you would agree. Thanks.

Brillian Novaspire
